title: Upgrade Classic workspace to the new Workspaces in Power BI
excerpt: Upgrade Classic workspace to the new Workspaces in Power BI In this video, we will learn, how we can upgrade our old classic workspaces to the new Workspaces in Power BI.  The new workspaces have more granular roles so that you can better manage access to the content.  Here, we will talk the step by
